author: dion
msg: Fixes bootstrap failing when MAVEN_HOME contains spaces, e.g. C:/Program Files/maven

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Don't have to preset sourcesPresent and testSourcesPresent anymore. This
also removes most of the [DEPRECATED] <available> warnings.

author: smor
msg: ObjectBridge is now a Jakarta Project :)

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to ensure that MavenJellyContext continues to behave as normal even when things like <j:include> is called which creates a new child context.

Also to simplify and optimize things a little, when loading properties files where the values are constant expressions, i.e. just plain text, which is very common, we unwrap the Expression object, so that just the constant String value is stored in the variable scopes.
This also fixes a wierd problem I found with variables in properties files that don't have dots in their name
